meaningMnemonic: This <radical>door</radical> is <radical>big</radical> and you need to <kanji>return</kanji> it to its rightful owner. This door is too big and important looking to not belong to someone. You need to find its owner and return it to them.
readingMnemonic: You are in <kanji>return</kanji> <reading>mode</reading> (もど). When you enter this mode, you concentrate only on returning something. Nothing else matters in this mode. You’re in full on return mode.
